sourceDesc.p: The contents of this document are generated from SOSOL.

div.p: Translation: from P.Oxy. 12 ... and ... and associates, deceased, at Theadelphia 59 3/4 arurae of Crown land rented at 3 1/6 1/150 1/12 artabae of wheat, 1 1/120 art. of lentils, .. ar. of confiscated (?) land at 5 1/5 1/30 1/500 art. of wheat, 1/6 1/40 1/200 art. of lentils, at Euhemeria 7 ar. of Crown land at 5 1/3 1/10 1/50 1/600 art. of wheat, 1/6 1/20 1/200 art. of barley, 1/2 1/75 art. of lentils, now cultivated by Aphrodisius son of ...,... son of Mustharas and Ischeis his brother, Horion son of Fudaemon, ..., Isas son of Horus, blind, Heraïscus son of Akoikis, Poseis son of Theon, ... priest.
